page.title: 13Recreation-South Washington.
page.content: The{schools}in the area provide opportunities for various sports and musical activities during the day. {Harraton Primary School}also has a {Community Room.}The groups making use of this facility include Mothers and Toddlers,play groups,keep fit,youth clubs,gardening societies,table tennis and Parents' Associations.Other areas have separate{Community Centres providing these and other activities such as Scouts etc, dancing classes and Karate.Within easy reach are two swimming pools.The Boys Brigade and Army Cadets meet at Birtley. Many local people enjoy working on allotments and breeding racing pigeons while some visit riverside parks, adventure playgrounds and public houses.There are fields supplied with football posts for general use.The area appears to cater for all ages.
